resources.string: First, a timer has two elements, a time and a label. Both the time and the label can be set by the user when the timer is created. You can also edit these values later by clicking on each timer.

Sync to Database: Synchronizes the current timer list to database. When clicked, it displays the different possible synchronization choices.
Get from Database: Downloads and updates the current timer list to the last saved list.
Clear list: Clears the current timer list.
Options: Displays an extra list of options e.g. About App.
Play/Pause: Resumes or pauses the current running timer
